===Inventory=== In Heretic, a player can carry up to 16 samples of any given inventory item. If a player already has 16 items of a given type, more items of the same type can't be picked up until some are used. Only one of each type is kept upon entering a new level. {{Class|ArtiEgg}} // Morph Ovum (turns enemies into chickens) {{Class|ArtiFly}} // Wings of Wrath (flight for a limited duration) {{Class|ArtiHealth}} // Quartz Flask (heals up to 25 hp) {{Class|ArtiInvisibility}} // Shadow Sphere (gives translucency) {{Class|ArtiInvulnerability}} // Ring of Invincibility (invulnerability + goldmap) {{Class|ArtiSuperHealth}} // Mystic Urn (heals up to 99 hp) {{Class|ArtiTeleport}} // Chaos Device (teleports back to level start) {{Class|ArtiTimeBomb}} // Time Bomb of the Ancients (detonate after a few seconds) {{Class|ArtiTomeOfPower}} // Tome of Power (makes all Heretic weapons more powerful) {{Class|ArtiTorch}} // Torch (maximum brightness in all sectors, like Doom's infrared goggles)
===Powerups=== Contrarily to inventory items, powerups are used directly upon pickup. If they are not needed, they are not picked up. {{Class|BagOfHolding}} // Bag of holding (Heretic's backpack) {{Class|CrystalVial}} // Crystal vial (heals up to 10 hp) {{Class|EnchantedShield}} // Enchanted shield (200 armor) {{Class|SilverShield}} // Silver shield (100 armor) {{Class|SuperMap}} // Map scroll (shows unexplored areas in gray lines on the automap)
